author: arnetheduck
content:
https://hackmd.io/@arnetheduck/BJiJw012j - latest decoupling design
TODO:
* naming and phrasing cleanup
* historical and root request specs
  * for by-root requests, it makes sense to be able to request one blob at a time
  * for by-range requests, this seems less useful, aka we should probably introduce a wrapper that contains a list of `BlobSidecar` objects

author: skylenet
